attributes.action: To stop UK reg companies making offshore nuisance calls.
attributes.additional_details: Anyone who as a mobile or a landline in the UK has more than enough daily evidence of the nuisance and psychological harm caused by these calls, ask any of the millions that have to suffer these calls, it needs to be stopped now.
attributes.background: Millions suffer from daily unsolicited phone calls from obviously foreign call centres, the government says the centres are beyond their area of control, however they can control and heavily fine UK registered companies that use these nightmare call centres to spread psychological misery in the UK
